contents.title: Giffyglyph's Brilliant Bard
contents.blurb:
You are a bard, a master of words and songs and sounds. All the world is a stage—and you are the main performance. But as you strike out into the world, what kind of bard will you choose to be?

Are you a singer, stirring emotion in both ally and enemy with your powerful voice? Are you a writer, penning delicate prose to inspire friends and slander foes? Or are you a performer, dazzling crowds with your skilled act and sharp wit?

Whatever your focus, Giffyglyph's Brilliant Bard introduces new mechanics, features, and subclasses for your D&D 5e character. Add new 1st-10th level options to your campaign and head out into adventure.
features: Revised rules, features, and mechanics for levels 1-10.
New class resources—use your compositions to help inspire your allies.
Master new spells with an expanded spell list.
New subclasses and subclass options—choose your college from the very first level.
Consistent resting—recover your strength with a long rest and take control of your adventure.
Variant dials to customise your playstyle.

chapters.title: Variant Dials
